verses.verse: Put In Remembrance <WG5279> Them <WG846> To Rulers <WG746> And <WG2532> To Authorities <WG1849> To Be Subject, <WG5293> To Be Obedient, <WG3980> To <WG4314> Every <WG3956> Work <WG2041> Good <WG18> Ready <WG2092> To Be, <WG1511>
No One <WG3367> To Speak Evil Of, <WG987> Not Contentious <WG269> To Be, To Be <WG1511> Gentle, <WG1933> All <WG3956> Shewing <WG1731> Meekness <WG4236> Towards <WG4314> All <WG3956> Men. <WG444>

<WG1510> For Were <WG1063> Once <WG4218> Also <WG2532> We <WG2249> Without Intelligence, <WG453> Disobedient, <WG545> Led Astray, <WG4105> Serving <WG1398> Lusts <WG1939> And <WG2532> Pleasures <WG2237> Various, <WG4164> In <WG1722> Malice <WG2549> And <WG2532> Envy <WG5355> Living, <WG1236> Hateful, <WG4767> Hating <WG3404> One Another. <WG240>
<WG3753> But When <WG1161> The <WG3588> Kindness <WG5544> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Love To Man <WG5363> Appeared <WG2014> <WG3588> <WG4990> Of Our Saviour <WG2257> God, <WG2316>

Not <WG3756> By <WG1537> Works <WG2041> Which Were <WG3588> In <WG1722> Righteousness <WG1343> Which <WG3739> Practised <WG4160> We, <WG2249> But <WG235> According To <WG2596> <WG3588> <WG846> His Mercy <WG1656> He Saved <WG4982> Us, <WG2248> Through The <WG1223> Washing <WG3067> Of Regeneration <WG3824> And <WG2532> Renewing <WG342> Of The Spirit <WG4151> Holy, <WG40>
Which <WG3739> He Poured Out <WG1632> ' On <WG1909> Us <WG2248> Richly <WG4146> Through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> <WG3588> <WG4990> Our Saviour; <WG2257>

That <WG2443> Having Been Justified <WG1344> <WG3588> <WG1565> By His Grace, <WG5485> Heirs <WG2818> We Should Become <WG1096> ' According To The <WG2596> Hope <WG1680> Of Life <WG2222> Eternal. <WG166>

Faithful Is <WG4103> The <WG3588> Word, <WG3056> And <WG2532> Concerning <WG4012> These Things <WG5130> I Desire <WG1014> Thee <WG4571> To Affirm Strongly, <WG1226> That <WG2443> May Take Care <WG5431> Good <WG2570> Works To <WG2041> Be Forward In <WG4291> They Who <WG3588> Have Believed <WG4100> <WG3588> God. <WG2316> These Things <WG5023> Are <WG2076> <WG3588> Good <WG2570> And <WG2532> Profitable <WG5624> <WG3588> To Men; <WG444>

<WG3474> But Foolish <WG1161> Questions <WG2214> And <WG2532> Genealogies <WG1076> And <WG2532> Strifes <WG2054> And <WG2532> Contentions <WG3163> About The Law <WG3544> Stand Aloof From; <WG4026> They Are <WG1526> For <WG1063> Unprofitable <WG512> And <WG2532> Vain. <WG3152>
A Sectarian <WG141> Man <WG444> After <WG3326> <WG1520> And <WG2532> A Second <WG1208> Admonition <WG3559> Reject, <WG3868>
Knowing <WG1492> That <WG3754> Is Perverted <WG1612> <WG3588> Such A One, <WG5108> And <WG2532> Sins, <WG264> Being <WG5607> Self Condemned. <WG843>

When <WG3752> I Shall Send <WG3992> Artemas <WG734> To <WG4314> Thee, <WG4571> Or <WG2228> Tychicus, <WG5190> Be Diligent <WG4704> To Come <WG2064> To <WG4314> Me <WG3165> To <WG1519> Nicopolis; <WG3533> <WG1563> For There <WG1063> I Have Decided <WG2919> To Winter. <WG3914>
Zenas <WG2211> The <WG3588> Lawyer <WG3544> And <WG2532> Apollos <WG625> Diligently <WG4709> Set Forward, <WG4311> That <WG2443> Nothing <WG3367> To Them <WG846> May Be Lacking; <WG3007>

Let Learn <WG3129> And <WG1161> Also <WG2532> <WG3588> Ours <WG2251> Good <WG2570> Works <WG2041> To Be Forward In <WG4291> For <WG1519> <WG3588> Necessary <WG316> Wants, <WG5532> That <WG2443> <WG3361> They May Not Be <WG5600> Unfruitful. <WG175>

Salute <WG782> Thee <WG4571> Those <WG3588> ' With <WG3326> Me <WG1700> All. <WG3956> Salute <WG782> Those Who <WG3588> Love <WG5368> Us <WG2248> In The <WG1722> Faith. <WG4102> <WG3588> Grace Be <WG5485> With <WG3326> All <WG3956> You. <WG5216> . Amen. <WG281> To <WG4314> Titus <WG5103> Of The <WG3588> Of The Creationist <WG2912> Assembly <WG1577> First <WG4413> Overseer <WG1985> Chosen. <WG5500> Written <WG1125> From <WG575> Nicopolis <WG3533> <WG3588> Of Macedonia. <WG3109>
